Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45287 affecting package golang for versions less than 1.20.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-45287 affecting package golang for versions less than 1.20.0-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package golang is earlier than 1.20.0-1, affected by CVE-2023-45287
